prompt: Build a simple TODO API with CRUD operations for tasks. Each task has a title, description, and completed status.
Create a bookstore API with books, authors, and reviews. Books belong to authors. Users can leave reviews with a rating (1-5) and comment.
Build a user authentication API with JWT tokens. Include user registration, login, profile retrieval, and password change endpoints.
Create a blog platform API with posts, comments, tags, and categories. Posts can have multiple tags. Comments belong to posts. Include pagination on list endpoints.
Build an inventory management API with products, categories, and stock movements. Track stock levels with an audit trail of additions and removals.
